thread.title: That Time Donald Trump Had A Meeting With DREAMers And Said “You Convinced Me” On Immigration
thread.title_full: That Time Donald Trump Had A Meeting With DREAMers And Said “You Convinced Me” On Immigration

author: Kelly Chen
title: That Time Donald Trump Had A Meeting With DREAMers And Said “You Convinced Me” On Immigration
text:
3 Email That Time Donald Trump Had A Meeting With DREAMers And Said “You Convinced Me” On Immigration BuzzFeed Posted: 08/26/2015 07:17 PM EDT 
Two years ago, Trump met with immigration activists who told them their stories and asked for his support on immigration. “You convinced me,” Trump said as the meeting ended.
